liveOnly.label: Live Only
liveOnly.tooltip: Only allow giveaway entries when stream is live

startCommand.label: Start Command
startCommand.tooltip: Command for starting a new giveaway

cooldownDays.label: Cooldown Days
cooldownDays.tooltip: Days before a winner can enter again

startResponse.value: ðŸŽ® Giveaway started! Use $command <game_id> <discord_username> [entries] to enter! Example: $command abc123 JohnDoe#1234 5
startResponse.label: Start Response

startResponse2.value: Discord username is compulsory! Make sure to provide your correct Discord username when entering!
startResponse2.label: Start Response 2
startResponse2.tooltip: Second message shown when giveaway starts

entryResponse.label: Entry Response
entryResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user enters giveaway

updateResponse.label: Update Response
updateResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user updates entries

winnerResponse.value: ðŸŽ‰ $user won the giveaway with $entries entries!
winnerResponse.label: Winner Response
winnerResponse.tooltip: Message shown when winner is selected

alreadyWonResponse.value: $user won recently and is on cooldown until $cooldown
alreadyWonResponse.label: Already Won Response
alreadyWonResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user is on cooldown

invalidDiscordResponse.value: $user Invalid Discord username format. Please provide your Discord username(unique id).
invalidDiscordResponse.label: Invalid Discord Response
invalidDiscordResponse.tooltip: Message shown for invalid Discord username

invalidEntriesResponse.value: $user Invalid number of entries. Please provide a valid number.
invalidEntriesResponse.label: Invalid Entries Response
invalidEntriesResponse.tooltip: Message shown for invalid number of entries

insufficientPointsResponse.value: $user You need $cost points to enter the giveaway. You have $points points.
insufficientPointsResponse.label: Insufficient Points Response
insufficientPointsResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user doesn't have enough points

noParticipantsResponse.label: No Participants Response
noParticipantsResponse.tooltip: Message shown when no participants in giveaway

notStartedResponse.value: $user Giveaway is not active right now!
notStartedResponse.label: Not Started Response
notStartedResponse.tooltip: Message shown when giveaway is not active

noPermissionResponse.value: $user You don't have permission to draw the winner!
noPermissionResponse.label: No Permission Response
noPermissionResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user lacks permission

resetSuccessResponse.value: $user Giveaway data has been reset successfully!
resetSuccessResponse.label: Reset Success Response
resetSuccessResponse.tooltip: Message shown when giveaway is reset

resetNoPermissionResponse.value: $user You don't have permission to reset the giveaway!
resetNoPermissionResponse.label: Reset No Permission Response
resetNoPermissionResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user can't reset giveaway

duplicateGameIdResponse.value: $user This game ID is already registered by another user!
duplicateGameIdResponse.label: Duplicate Game ID Response
duplicateGameIdResponse.tooltip: Message shown for duplicate game ID

duplicateDiscordResponse.value: $user This Discord username is already registered by another user!
duplicateDiscordResponse.label: Duplicate Discord Response
duplicateDiscordResponse.tooltip: Message shown for duplicate Discord username

gameIdOnCooldownResponse.value: $user This game ID is on cooldown until $cooldown!
gameIdOnCooldownResponse.label: Game ID Cooldown Response
gameIdOnCooldownResponse.tooltip: Message shown when game ID is on cooldown

discordOnCooldownResponse.value: $user This Discord username is on cooldown until $cooldown!
discordOnCooldownResponse.label: Discord Cooldown Response
discordOnCooldownResponse.tooltip: Message shown when Discord username is on cooldown

firstTimeEntryResponse.value: $user To enter the giveaway for the first time, use: $command <game_id> <discord_username> [entries] Example: $command abc123 JohnDoe#1234 5
firstTimeEntryResponse.label: First Time Entry Response

responseStartSecond.value: Remember to include your Discord username to be eligible!
responseStartSecond.label: Start Message 2

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: You don't have enough points to enter!
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not Enough Points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip: Message when user doesn't have enough points

responseInvalidFormat.label: Invalid Format
responseInvalidFormat.tooltip: Message when command format is invalid

responseAlreadyEntered.label: Already Entered
responseAlreadyEntered.tooltip: Message when user has already entered

responseNoWinner.value: No one has entered the giveaway yet!
responseNoWinner.label: No Winner
responseNoWinner.tooltip: Message when no one has entered

responseOnCooldown.value: You're on cooldown from winning! Try again in {0} days.
responseOnCooldown.label: On Cooldown
responseOnCooldown.tooltip: Message when user is on cooldown

responseGiveawayNotActive.value: There is no active giveaway at the moment!
responseGiveawayNotActive.label: Not Active
responseGiveawayNotActive.tooltip: Message when no giveaway is active

existingEntryResponse.value: $user You already have an entry with Game ID: $gameid and Discord ID: $discordid. Use $updategameid <new_gameid> or $updatediscordid <new_discordid> to update.
existingEntryResponse.label: Existing Entry Response
existingEntryResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user tries to enter but already has an entry

updateGameIdSuccess.value: $user Your Game ID has been updated from $oldid to $newid
updateGameIdSuccess.label: Update Game ID Success
updateGameIdSuccess.tooltip: Message shown when game ID is updated successfully

updateDiscordIdSuccess.value: $user Your Discord ID has been updated from $oldid to $newid
updateDiscordIdSuccess.label: Update Discord ID Success
updateDiscordIdSuccess.tooltip: Message shown when Discord ID is updated successfully

noExistingEntryResponse.value: $user You need to enter the giveaway first using $command <game_id> <discord_username> [entries]
noExistingEntryResponse.label: No Existing Entry Response
noExistingEntryResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user tries to update but has no entry

entriesCommand.label: Entries Command
entriesCommand.tooltip: Command to view your giveaway entry

entriesResponse.value: $user Your entry: Game ID: $gameid, Discord ID: $discordid, Entries: $entries
entriesResponse.label: Entries Response
entriesResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user checks their entry

noEntryResponse.value: $user You haven't entered the giveaway yet! Use $command <game_id> <discord_username> [entries] to enter.
noEntryResponse.label: No Entry Response
noEntryResponse.tooltip: Message shown when user has no entry
